reviews.review: good game, but too many cheaters
Tato hra umí být velmi zábavná akorát mě štvou hackeři kteří jsou tam celkem občas i na prime účtě jinak bych určitě tuto hru doporučil všem kterým baví multiplayer střílečky.

VERY COOL GAME TO PLAY WHEN YOU ARE BOARD

This game is actually based on my friend Eric and how he got his way to kill Osama bin laden.
Никому не рекомендую играть в эту парашу. Куча читеров, багов, постоянно лежат сервера и очень токсичные игроки
Even though there is some hackers. Its fun to play with friends even family if they like first person shooters. This game also gives you the opportunity to meet more people.
好玩，无基础的最好，经常被队友问候
Игра класс если комп и инет норм залагало твой темейт скажет тебе очень много окурва
Если вы любитель долбежки в задницу, то игра для вас
Если вам повезло во время секса без контрацептива то это значит что вы очень везучий и вам определённо стоит проиграть в эту игру.Так как вам очень будет везти
Теперь я знаю где я живу и кто мои родители
Игра очень хорошая, играю в неё 4 года. Она очень много изменилась с 2017 года.
favourite game and always will be <3

Actually cured my A.I.D.S I finally feel true bliss after playing this game. I used to feel nothing but pain and suffering in my life until I played this game, but playing this game nullified that because now I feel nothing :) but endless insanity and the careful lifeless kiss of death. I wait daily in my own demise and suffering. Please help me.

Game is so good, but community cursed this shooter. Cheaters, boosters and toxic guys kills CS. idk how Valve does CS with Prime status(IF u have 21 rank before "B summer 2021) free. MANY CHEATERS become from this update. Valve can't do anything, because one guy is some money. Many guys - many money. I don't want to say, but Valve dont do now huge update. New case is money, new operation - too money. Soooo many Valve have money and we must game with cheaters. Sooo... is annoying. I think CS must be awesome game, but without some friends u cant win in competentive(
